body:
Hey, guys! Back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, feel free to make an application here https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Anyways, this week's community member is Bloodoh!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is Bloodoh, and my favourite game in avicus is the whole Nebula :D

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Well, my name is Max. Im a 15 years old guy, im born in USA, but i live in Argentina now. im a bit rager.

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I want to pass my final exams and enjoy my summer holidays, thats all for now.

What interests you the most in life?
I want to be a programmer, game and web programmed, 3d designer too :)

​What music/art/media do you like?
I dont have a favourite music. But i like Trap, Rap and some pop music.

​Where are you from?
Im from Argentina, Buenos Aires.

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
Playing with my team, or just playing with school friends. Often i play alone too. 

​Anything else you want to mention?

im the best pvper.

title: Community Spotlight #8 - Bloodoh

replies.body: hook me up with your rap maxo
